projectGridLines.title: Founderâ€™s Office
projectGridLines.description:
1. Market Research for finding deeper opportunities for automation in the US market,

including debt collections and insurance; modeling for revenue projections and pitch deck

2. Product improvements - gathering requirements for improvement of internal and user

facing products, including contribution towards planning short and long term roadmaps

3. Contribution towards sales decks, client conversations, and investor relations

4. Leading brand comms and content with the content point of contact; strategising the

right communication strategy across website, pitch deck and socials

Skill sets: Great Written & Spoken English, Position of Responsibility (PoR) or projects

with proof of work on non-technical front, demonstrated interest in startups and building

projects ground up

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, Primary / Secondary Research, Networking

Expected learning: Enabling students to learn the rails of starting up by directly working

with the founding team
